casebody.data:
No. 10-10018. Kenneth R. Isom, Petitioner v. Arkansas (two judgments). 564 U.S. 1023, 131 S. Ct. 3029,

180 L. Ed. 2d 853,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 4749. June 20, 2011.

Petition for writ of cer-tiorari to the Supreme Court of Arkansas denied.

Same case below, 372 S.W.3d 809 (first judgment), 370 S.W.3d 491 (second judgment).
